phrases: What kind of cake should we have for Christmas?
I am hanging out with friends this year, so do not worry about it.
If you are going to make a cake again next year, you should make a Santa doll too!
On second thought, I WILL have cake on the 25th so go on, make one!
Dude, you are making a cake from scratch?
You are better than most DADS.
Taihei, if little Tanukichi was not around, you would have nothing to do and just shrivel up, huh?
Anyway, it looks like we will not have to work overtime today, so how about we go somewhere?
And you are overdue to join us, Alex.
I am going to a Christmas concert of anime songs.
Would you like to come with me?
If you can enjoy yourself, that will be good indeed!
Sore nara kitto kachi desu wa Do that, and you are sure to win indeed!
Christmas will be kind of boring without Tanukichi around.
No, we SHOULD go to that concert.
Hey, Ebina, you are okay with not going back to Akita this year?
I have gone back because I felt sad ringing in the new year alone...
But with all the fun we have been having together, I have not felt lonely at all.
And we shall have fun indeed!
The reason being... it is indeed Christmas!
Do not you celebrate Christmas at home?
I am spending Christmas with Umaru!
Hey, do you want to go see the lights?
It is nothing but couples here.
Big Brother sure looked pretty sad...
This is way more fun than I thought it would be, Alex!
Wherever you go, there are so many people...
Everyone wants to do something on Christmas, right?
So, do none of you have a special someone with whom to spend this time?
In that case, why do not we all go back to my house?
We will have a Christmas party!
I thought we were going to talk about relationships, but she was just inviting us over...
Someone spent a LOT of time decorating...
You can sit where you like, indeed!
Actually, one more person will be joining us!
I have invited my good friend UMR!
The champion of the gaming world!
And the person who gave me this badge!
Oh, that badge is from a game?
Did I promise to meet her today?
And it is thanks to UMR that we were able to get together like this today!
I have not had many friends since coming to Japan.
Even after enrolling in school, I had little idea indeed as to how to make friends.
But then, I learned the Japanese custom of making friends by challenging others and beating them!
I wanted to make friends with Umaru, which is why I challenged her at school.
But it was UMR who taught me... you do not make friends by beating them, you do it by having FUN with them.
And the strength of that becomes a dream that will lead to the future!
It was UMR's advice that let me become friends with you all!
It was a lesson well learned:
If something is bothering you, just ask for advice.
There are indeed many, many things for UMR and I to discuss!
I am sure she is worn out.
she decorated this room all by herself.
Let us make sure not to wake her as we leave.
I had a lot of fun today!
This was sent two hours ago...
All these texts being sent on Christmas must be causing delays.
I left something at Sylphin's house.
Are you okay going home alone?
Were not you supposed to hang out with Umaru today?
I was, up until a little while ago.
But she said she forgot something, so...
I cannot believe she just left you on your own.
How about we go back together?
It is just, I... I... I...
I am sorry for putting you out like this.
No, do not worry about it.
It is dangerous to be out alone at night, right?
If something is bothering you, just ask for advice.
Um, there is something I would like to talk to you about.
Now then, tell me what you would like for a present.
In that case, I... I would like some Japanese friends!
So, that is what you wished for?
I mean, even Santa could not make FRIENDS happen, huh?
But, I want some friends I can talk to about Japan, indeed!
Just ask for a computer once you are in middle school.
You can talk to people from Japan just by using the internet.
This is my Japanese friend, Shinra Rasenken Sirius.
That is an impressive name indeed!
And I will be able to meet him soon.
Brother, you are going to Japan?
I will be going to high school there.
I am sure you will be a little sad when Alex leaves.
You two have always been close...
That is one fearsome Japanese fighter!
This hard-fought battle has forged mutual respect!
By challenging others, one can make friends...
Here, it is a fighting game controller!
She sure has started to want some strange things...
Today was so much fun, Sylphin!
I was very happy that you invited me.
I guess they have all gone home.
UMR, why are you dressed like that?
Well, I saw them selling these, so... d-does it look okay on me?
I am sorry I am late.
Um, do you mind if I come in?
I want a Japanese friend indeed!
It is not like you to hand this out first thing in the morning!
It is your New Year's allowance.
You do not seem happy at all.
It is like when a vending machine messes up and gives you two drinks instead of one.
Would you, dear Consumer, pay for both?
This mistake is all on my brother!
What if you order one bowl but you friggin' get TWO?
I sure feel lucky to have gotten two!
But you got to pay for that other one, right?
Otherwise, the fault now lies with YOU!
If I put in one coin but end up getting two prizes, they are both still mine!
That is just the nature of the game, right?
And life is like a game, right?!
Life is about goals and aimin' for the top!
More to the point, why would Big Brother have prepared TWO envelopes?
Yeah, he should only need one, right?
This whole time, something has felt off.
That he would planned on giving two New Year's allowances all along!
Guess I will give her two this year.
YOU-um, I hope I can be of help to you this year as well.
Yes, but... she is still asleep.
I have a New Year's gift for you.
I put it right here, next to Umaru's.
Sorry it is not in an envelope.
Ebina said she is going to check out the New Year's sales.
Let us talk about vending machines...
He got called to the meeting room a little while ago.
He gets all mad if I leave even a small mess.
By a small mess, does she mean...?
Come on, Umaru, you need to put this away.
I told you to clean up after yourself!
he is a good listener, and he is really kind.
All Big Brother ever does is get mad!
Still, that is not to say I am entirely without fault...
It turns out Big Brother is SUPER nice!
On the other hand, I am just...
Get me some cola and potato chips.
From the outside looking in, all I do is push Big Brother around!
I am sure you have had a long day at work!
Come on, just have a seat...
Hurry up and step right in, Big Brother!
Umaru, I need to talk to you.
I have to go on a business trip.
So you... you will not be coming back?
I got chosen as a member of the project team, and I will have to go out of town.
I will not be able to come back here for a while.
You cannot leave me, Big Brother!
You cannot just leave and not come back!
I am worried about this too, but the decision has been made.
How long will you be gone?
If I am gone for two weeks, you will make a real mess around here, right?
THAT IS WHAT YOU ARE WORRIED ABOUT?!
What makes you think I will make a mess?!
Yeah, but... look, just get out and stay gone, for at least two weeks!
It sure is fun to enjoy Christmas with some anime songs, right?!
Bomba, you finally get it, huh?
I GET TO ENJOY THE SEASON EVEN THOUGH I DO NOT HAVE A GIRLFRIEND!
There are people crying in front of their TVs right now!
